name: MotivationMafia
0:
”Alexa, ask motivation mafia for quote of the day”
”Alexa, ask motivation mafia for a motivational quote”
”Alexa, open motivation mafia and tell me something good”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: motivation mafia
des:
WARNING!!!!
The Motivation Mafia will destroy your negative energy.

Wherever you are, just say the magic words and be prepared to be motivated, deeply moved and/or prompted for deeper thinking.

And also be ready to be totally changed by these daily motivations.
As Albert Einstein said: "The measure of intelligence is the ability to change"!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
